P

parseRSSFile(File) - Method in class model.PodcastModel
Parses a passed in xml / rss file and creates an arrayList of episodes, with each episode in the podcast being stored in the arrayList.
pause() - Method in class controller.PodcastController
Gets the model to pause the audio file.
pauseAudio() - Method in class model.PodcastModel
Pauses the audio file.
play() - Method in class controller.PodcastController
Gets the model to play the audio file.
playAudio() - Method in class model.PodcastModel
Plays the audio file.
player - Variable in class model.PodcastModel
 
Podcast - Class in controller
The podcast object class, which is mainly a container for a grouping of episodes that make up that podcast.
Podcast() - Constructor for class controller.Podcast
Creates a new instance of the podcast object, which stores an ArrayList of episodes that make up the podcast.
PodcastController - Class in controller
The controller of the Podcast Manager application, which serves as the link between the GUI view that allows for user interaction, and the model the stores the necessary information about the files the view can display.
PodcastController(PodcastModel) - Constructor for class controller.PodcastController
The constructor of the controller which contains a model object to allow the view to interact with audio files.
podcastImage(Episode) - Method in class view.ViewUIMain
Sets the title, image, and author of the podcast playing.
PodcastMain - Class in <Unnamed>
The main class of the Podcast Manager application that loads the view to allow the user to see and interact with the application.
PodcastMain() - Constructor for class PodcastMain
 
PodcastModel - Class in model
The model of the Podcast Manager application that handles the bulk of work dealing with the managing of files, and their settings.
PodcastModel() - Constructor for class model.PodcastModel
The default constructor of the model that initializes all fields as necessary when there is no current audio filed loaded.
PodcastModel(File) - Constructor for class model.PodcastModel
The constructor of the model that initializes all fields as necessary when there is an audio filed to be loaded.
PODCASTS_FOLDER - Static variable in class view.ViewUIMain
 
podcastTitle - Variable in class model.Episode
